definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:baptised</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="deal_damage"><field name="damagesource">GENERIC</field><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
